Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT
REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Relates to the right of tenant association to have the first option to purchase a housing unit
Summary: Relates to the right of tenant association to have the first option to purchase a housing unit.
LawCode: Add Art 2-A §§38 - 38-l, Priv Hous Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the private housing finance law, in relation to right of first refusal
